```py
ma.ptp(obj, axis=None, out=None, fill_value=None, keepdims=<no value>)
```

```py
>>> y = np.ma.MaskedArray([[1, 127],
...                        [0, 127],
...                        [-1, 127],
...                        [-2, 127]], dtype=np.int8)
>>> y.ptp(axis=1)
masked_array(data=[ 126,  127, -128, -127],
 mask=False,
 fill_value=999999,
 dtype=int8) 
```
